narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: The Chrysalis Center is a Voluntary or Charitable provider based in Los Angeles, CA. From 2023-05 through 2024-10, this provider received $256K in Medicaid payments across 4K claims serving 992 beneficiaries, billing 2 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: 92% of all billing comes from a single procedure code: T2014 (T2014). This extreme concentration is unusual and may indicate specialized services or a narrow billing pattern.
Spending more than doubled from $52K in 2023 to $204K in 2024 (290% growth).
Saw a 3.9× spike in 2024 ($52K → $204K), a sharp year-over-year increase.
